name: Blender connect
description:
This Figma plugin offers you the possibility to load textures directly from Figma into your Blender file.

You can apply them directly to selected objects and faces or simply paste them as a plane.


This plugin is only the "bridge" between Blender and Figma. You also need to install the Blender addon. It's free, but I would of course appreciate a small donation if you like it


https://ph1p.gumroad.com/l/figma-blender-addon
